skills.title: React.Js
skills.description: Proficient in leveraging the React.js library to build responsive, high-performance web applications with a focus on component-based architecture and efficient state management.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: Skilled in JavaScript for creating dynamic, interactive web features and enhancing user experiences through efficient and clean code.

skills.title: HTML
skills.description: Experienced in crafting semantic and well-structured HTML to ensure accessibility, SEO optimization, and a solid foundation for web applications.

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: Proficient in CSS with a knack for crafting visually stunning and seamlessly responsive web designs.

skills.title: TypeScript
skills.description: Skilled in using TypeScript to write robust, type-safe code, enhancing code maintainability, reducing runtime errors, and improving developer productivity in large-scale applications.

skills.title: TestCafe
skills.description: Experienced in using TestCafe for end-to-end testing of web applications, ensuring reliability and performance through automated, cross-browser test execution and easy integration with CI/CD pipelines.

skills.title: Jest
skills.description: Proficient in using Jest for unit and integration testing in JavaScript and React applications, ensuring code reliability, catching regressions early, and maintaining high test coverage.
